message.content:
cs.IR, cs.DL, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.CY

The paper discusses a new indicator for measuring disciplinarity-multidisciplinarity in scientific communication systems, which is applicable to any discipline. However, the example used in the paper is from the field of Library and Information Science, which falls under the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Digital Libraries (cs.DL) sub-categories of arXiv CS. The paper also discusses the spread and diversity of citations among subject categories, which could be related to Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) sub-categories. Finally, the paper mentions the transformation of knowledge from different disciplines, which could be related to the Cybersecurity (cs.CY) sub-category.
